name: The Shadow of Bearrintown
description:
Help your cute little friends to protect their small town until the night happens...

Play with WASD and the mouse (and some others surprise keys, wow!)

A game made with too many bears, and not enough beers for the Bear Jam

Dev team highscore:
Jadith Nicole Bruzenak: 190700
Christian Chaux: 127875
Alexandre Coulon: approx 53000
LuxioChaosyn: 41800

RIP baby bear that didn't manage to make it to the final game due to budget cut
